target: I was able to book your taxi. Be looking out for a yellow BMW. If you need to reach them, please call 07101227577. Is there anything else I can help with?
context: <user> Can you help me find a 4 star expensive hotel please? <system> I found two that fit your description; huntingdon marriott hotel and university arms hotel. <user> OK iLL GO WITH THE FIRST CHOICE THE huntingdon marriott hotel <system> That's a great hotel. Would you like me to make you a reservation? <user> Yes please for 7 people for 4 nights starting thursday and I need the reference number. <system> I've got you booked with reference number L7WTALJT . <user> Thank you. I am also looking for a Chinese restaurant in the same area as the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel. <system> There are no chinese restaurants in that area,any other type of food I can check with?<user> Are there any Chinese restaurants within a short distance outside the area which are in the same price range as the hotel? <system> I would recommend the Ugly Duckling in the center of town. That's an expensive Chinese restaurant right in the middle of everything.<user> Excellent, can I get the address of the Ugly Duckling? <system> Of course! The address is 12 St. Johns Street City Centre and the postcode is cb21tw. Would you like me to make a reservation for you?<user> No, but I would like to book a taxi between the restaurant and hotel. I've like to leave the restaurant by 17:30. <system>
